009package Ch09_AutomaticThresholding;
010
011import static imagingbook.common.ij.DialogUtils.addToDialog;
012import static imagingbook.common.ij.DialogUtils.askForSampleImage;
013import static imagingbook.common.ij.DialogUtils.getFromDialog;
014import static imagingbook.common.ij.IjUtils.noCurrentImage;
015
016import ij.ImagePlus;
017import ij.gui.GenericDialog;
018import ij.plugin.filter.PlugInFilter;
019import ij.process.ByteProcessor;
020import ij.process.ImageProcessor;
021import imagingbook.common.threshold.adaptive.AdaptiveThresholder;
022import imagingbook.common.threshold.adaptive.BernsenThresholder;
023import imagingbook.common.threshold.adaptive.BernsenThresholder.Parameters;
024import imagingbook.sampleimages.GeneralSampleImage;
025
026/**
027 * <p>
028 * ImageJ plugin showing the use of the {@link BernsenThresholder} class
029 * (see Sec. 9.2.1 of [1] for additional details).
030 * This plugin works on 8-bit grayscale images only. The original image
031 * is modified to a binary image.
032 * </p>
033 * <p>
034 * [1] W. Burger, M.J. Burge, <em>Digital Image Processing &ndash; An Algorithmic
035 * Introduction</em>, 3rd ed, Springer (2022).
036 * </p>
037 * 
038 * @author WB
039 * @version 2022/04/01
040 * @see imagingbook.common.threshold.adaptive.BernsenThresholder
041 */
042public class Adaptive_Bernsen implements PlugInFilter {
043        
044        private static Parameters params = new Parameters();
045        
046        /**
047         * Constructor, asks to open a predefined sample image if no other image
048         * is currently open.
049         */
050        public Adaptive_Bernsen() {
051                if (noCurrentImage()) {
052                        askForSampleImage(GeneralSampleImage.Kepler);
053                }
054        }
055        
056        @Override
057        public int setup(String arg, ImagePlus imp) {
058                return DOES_8G;
059        }
060
061        @Override
062        public void run(ImageProcessor ip) {
063                if (!runDialog(params))
064                        return;
065                
066                ByteProcessor I = (ByteProcessor) ip;   
067                AdaptiveThresholder thr = new BernsenThresholder(params);
068                ByteProcessor Q = thr.getThreshold(I);
069                thr.threshold(I, Q);
070        }
071        
072        boolean runDialog(Parameters params) {
073                GenericDialog gd = new GenericDialog(this.getClass().getSimpleName());
074                addToDialog(params, gd);
075                
076                gd.showDialog();
077                if (gd.wasCanceled()) {
078                        return false;
079                }       
080                
081                getFromDialog(params, gd);
082                return true;
083        }
084}
